name: runmiles
description: Integrates Geotab vehicle miles into Monday.com

scripts.start: GEOTAB_DATABASE=${{ secrets.GEOTAB_DATABASE }} GEOTAB_USERNAME=${{ secrets.GEOTAB_USERNAME }} GEOTAB_PASSWORD=${{ secrets.GEOTAB_PASSWORD }} MONDAY_ACCESS_TOKEN=${{ secrets.MONDAY_ACCESS_TOKEN }} node miles.js

author: Bentsion Weiss
